sources.title: Live Wire, The
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: The Live Wire (1935) RICHARD TALMADGE
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Presents Classic Movie Monday
Starring: Richard Talmadge, Alberta Vaughn, George Walsh
Director: Harry S. Webb

In this South Seas Romantic Adventure, a Sailor and a pair of archaeologists head off to an uncharted island to discover the ancient treasure of a lost civilization.

TRIVIA: Richard Talmadge, born Sylvester Ricardo Metzetti, was a member of the Flying Metzettis, a family of acrobats renowned for originating the quadruple back somersault!

metadata.Plot: A sailor finds an ancient vase on an uncharted island. He is later hired by archaeologists to lead them back to the island. They discover the temples of a lost civilization.
metadata.Actors: Richard Talmadge, Alberta Vaughn, George Walsh
